text: Virgin Soil Upturned () is a 1939 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuli Raizman.Поднятая целинаПоднятая целина (1940) It stars Gavriil Belov, Sergei Blinnikov, and Mikhail Bolduman. == Actors == * Gavriil Belov as Ostrovnov * Sergei Blinnikov as Bannik * Mikhail Bolduman as Nagulnov * Boris Dobronravov as Davydov * Vladimir Dorofeyev as grandfather Shchukar == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1939 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuli Raizman
title: Virgin Soil Upturned (1939 movie)
